name: NodeJS Shopping Site
desc: Created a dynamic e-commerce site using NodeJS and MongoDB. Implemented session storage, CSRF tokens, error handling, and the EJS Template Engine

name: Selector Sandbox
desc: Used jQuery selectors and DOM manipulations to create a sandbox to test and experiment with jQuery and CSS Selectors

name: Expensify App
desc: Implemented Firebase authentication and realtime database on a ReactJS and Redux application to manage and track expenses
